name: Giulio Luzzati
title: Ph.D.
summary: Engineering lead with extensive expertise in harnessing and making sense of data. I analyse how systems work, design metrics and procedures to evaluate performance. My background is in digital signal processing and data science, and my solid full-stack development skills allow me to quickly build tools that enable data-driven decisions.
